feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:45 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 9:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -22.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -27.7°C
Wind: SW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
